Trade/Device Name(s): CLOTtrac Heparinase Test Cartridge (HTC) Coagulation Control
CLOTtrac® Heparinase Test Cartridge (HTC) Coagulation Control
Regulation Name(s): Activated whole blood clotting time tests
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for CLOTtrac Heparinase Test Cartridge (HTC) Coagulation Control modified to use revised USP porcine heparin for verification of ACT instrument and cartridge performance.
Indications for Use Summary: Used to verify the performance of the ACT instrument and Heparinase (HR-HTC) cartridges; for in vitro diagnostic use.
